FUNCTION is_solution(columnsCount, x) 

   implicit none 

   integer, intent(in) :: columnsCount

   character(len=12), intent(in) :: x

   logical :: is_solution

   integer :: i, column_index

   logical, dimension(0:columnsCount-1) :: allXs

   allXs = .true.

   do i = 1,12 

      if (x(i:i)/='X') then 

          column_index = mod(i-1, columnsCount )

          allXs( column_index ) = .false. 

      end if 

   end do 

   is_solution = any( allXs )

end function is_solution
